verses.verse: אָ֭הַבְתִּי <WH157> I love כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because יִשְׁמַ֥ע ׀ <WH8085> because he hath heard יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ק֝וֹלִ֗י <WH6963> my voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> [and] my supplications
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because הִטָּ֣ה <WH5186> Because he hath inclined אָזְנ֣וֹ <WH241> his ear לִ֑י וּבְיָמַ֥י <WH3117> upon [him] as long as I live אֶקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> unto me therefore will I call

אֲפָפ֤וּנִי ׀ <WH661> compassed חֶבְלֵי־ <WH2256> The sorrows מָ֗וֶת <WH4194> of death וּמְצָרֵ֣י <WH4712> me and the pains שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> of hell מְצָא֑וּנִי <WH4672> gat hold צָרָ֖ה <WH6869> trouble וְיָג֣וֹן <WH3015> and sorrow אֶמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> upon me I found

וּבְשֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> I upon the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> Then called אָנָּ֥ה <WH577> I beseech יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD מַלְּטָ֥ה <WH4422> thee deliver נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul
חַנּ֣וּן <WH2587> Gracious יְהֹוָ֣ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD וְצַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> and righteous וֵ֖אלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <WH430> yea our God מְרַחֵֽם׃ <WH7355> [is] merciful
שֹׁמֵ֣ר <WH8104> preserveth פְּתָאיִ֣ם <WH6612> the simple יְהֹוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD דַּ֝לּוֹתִ֗י <WH1809> I was brought low וְלִ֣י יְהוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> and he helped

שׁוּבִ֣י <WH7725> Return נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> O my soul לִמְנוּחָ֑יְכִי <WH4496> comfortable כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> for the LORD גָּמַ֥ל <WH1580> hath dealt bountifully עָלָֽיְכִי׃ <WH5921> and

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for חִלַּ֥צְתָּ <WH2502> For thou hast delivered נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> my soul מִ֫מָּ֥וֶת <WH4194> from death אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינִ֥י <WH5869> mine eyes מִן־ <WH4480> from דִּמְעָ֑ה <WH1832> from tears אֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלִ֥י <WH7272> [and] my feet מִדֶּֽחִי׃ <WH1762> from falling
אֶ֭תְהַלֵּךְ <WH1980> I will walk לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּ֝אַרְצ֗וֹת <WH776> in the land הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living
הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי <WH539> I believed כִּ֣י <WH3588> when אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> therefore have I spoken אֲ֝נִ֗י <WH589> I עָנִ֥יתִי <WH6031> afflicted מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> I was greatly
אֲ֭נִי <WH589> I אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> I said בְחָפְזִ֑י <WH2648> in my haste כָּֽל־ <WH3605> All הָאָדָ֥ם <WH120> All men כֹּזֵֽב׃ <WH3576> [are] liars
מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> What shall I render לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּֽל־ <WH3605> for all תַּגְמוּל֥וֹהִי <WH8408> [for] all his benefits עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> toward
כּוֹס־ <WH3563> the cup יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <WH3444> of salvation אֶשָּׂ֑א <WH5375> I will take וּבְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> upon the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> and call

נְ֭דָרַי <WH5088> my vows לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם <WH7999> I will pay נֶגְדָה־ <WH5048> the presence נָּ֝֗א <WH4994> Oh לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> now in the presence of all his people
יָ֭קָר <WH3368> Precious בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַ֝מָּ֗וְתָה <WH4194> [is] the death לַחֲסִידָֽיו׃ <WH2623> of his saints

אָֽנָּ֣ה <WH577> truly יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> O LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> surely אֲנִ֪י <WH589> I am עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ <WH5650> I [am] thy servant אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <WH589> I am עַ֭בְדְּךָ <WH5650> I [am] thy servant בֶּן־ <WH1121> [and] the son אֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH519> of thine handmaid פִּ֝תַּ֗חְתָּ <WH6605> thou hast loosed לְמוֹסֵרָֽי׃ <WH4147> my bonds

לְֽךָ־ אֶ֭זְבַּח <WH2076> I will offer זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> to thee the sacrifice תּוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> of thanksgiving וּבְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> upon the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> and will call

נְ֭דָרַי <WH5088> my vows לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם <WH7999> I will pay נֶגְדָה־ <WH5048> the presence נָּ֝֗א <WH4994> Oh לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> now in the presence of all his people

בְּחַצְר֤וֹת ׀ <WH2691> In the courts בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S בְּֽת֘וֹכֵ֤כִי <WH8432> in the midst יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <WH3389> of thee O Jerusalem הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
